message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take the low offer, or we'll go lower!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't get too comfortable!
Getting closer, but I want more!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting away with too much!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
I'm not desperate yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't get too cocky!
You're getting close to the edge, Alice!
I'm not going down without a fight! You're going to have to do better than that!
Last chance, Alice, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to settle for anything less than a fair share. You're going to have to do better than that!
Fine, we'll go to the tiebreaker! 50/50 it is!
